div.span: Our Food Service Department has been working hard providing over 25,000+ meals. Dinner service will be coming soon.

a.title: Go to comments for Food Service - Correction Dinner Service Start Date TBD

div.span: CORRECTION - DINNER SERVICE WILL BEGIN SOON. We are awaiting approval from the State. Stay tuned. In the meantime, all sites are still serving breakfast and lunch. Please share!

a.title: Go to comments for Correction Dinner Service - Coming Soon

div.span:
Our Food Service Department has been working hard providing over 25,000+ meals. Please note that we are now able to serve dinner as well. Dinner will be included at current lunchtime pickups. Please note that not all sites have been approved for dinner so please refer to the list below.
Currently (St Johns, Hunt, Bennet, Frost, Parkside, and YMCA).

a.title: Go to comments for DINNER NOW BEING SERVED

div.span: It is the policy of the Jackson Public Schools District that no discriminatory practices based on sex, race, color, national origin, religion, height, weight, marital status, handicap, age, political affiliation, sexual orientation or disability or any other status covered by federal, state or local law be allowed in providing instructional opportunities, programs, services, job placement assistance, employment or in policies governing student conduct and attendance. Any person suspecting a discriminatory practice should contact Jackson Public Schools, 522 Wildwood Avenue, Jackson, Michigan 49201 or call (517) 841-2200

It is the policy of the Jackson Public Schools District that no discriminatory practices based on sex, race, color, national origin, religion, height, weight, marital status, handicap, age, political affiliation, sexual orientation or disability or any other status covered by federal, state or local law be allowed in providing instructional opportunities, programs, services, job placement assistance, employment or in policies governing student conduct and attendance. Any person suspecting a discriminatory practice should contact Jackson Public Schools, 522 Wildwood Avenue, Jackson, Michigan 49201 or call (517) 841-2200
